hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that :Allah's Messenger said: "The Imam is answerable and the Mu'adh-dhin is entrusted. O Allah! Guide the Imams and pardon the Mu'adh-dhins

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ الإِمَامَ ضَامِنٌ وَالْمُؤَذِّنَ مُؤْتَمَنٌ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related That The Imam Is Answerable and the Mu'adh-dhin Is Entrusted
